content.raw: After installing other library testing this pull request, my `.pc` file is installed under `/home/caguero/local/lib/pkgconfig/ignition-project4.pc`. Is that OK? It seems that I'm missing the name of the Ignition library. I would expect `/home/caguero/local/lib/pkgconfig/ignition-transport4.pc`.
content.html: After installing other library testing this pull request, my .pc file is installed under /home/caguero/local/lib/pkgconfig/ignition-project4.pc. Is that OK? It seems that I'm missing the name of the Ignition library. I would expect /home/caguero/local/lib/pkgconfig/ignition-transport4.pc.
